attributes.action: make provision for any e-petition to the Prime Minister to have spaces for signatories both 'for' and 'against' the motion of the said petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days, where strong views are often expressed in the wording of a petition, an easy way to judge a balance of feeling would be simple lists of 'pro' and 'anti' signatures.  Such a move would simplify the method of demonstrating opposition to any motion put forward, without having to start up a separate petition against the original (and therefore not easily viewed simultaneously with the original)

rejection.details: Please send your comments to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
